title: Revenant: The Ballad of Darane: Book 4
description: War spreads across the land. What once shone brightly is lost in the darkness.The teachings of Aerokin talk of evil which will infect and consume everything it touches - and of a woman with the power to save or condemn all. The Ballad of Darane chronicles the journey of a woman with a destiny and power she does not understand or want, as she struggles to cope with the brutality of the world she inhabits. Revenant is the fourth book in the Ballad of Darane series.
author: Tir Cey
